description: SUPPORT TO POVERTY ASSESSMENT AND REDUCTION IN THE CARIBBEAN

subproject.description:
1. Integrated (economic, social and environmental) data collected, analysed and made available for use by policy and decision makers .
2. Statistical capacity of CSO and line ministry staff built in at least 2 countries through reports and training
3. Reports available outlining poverty and social impact analysis (PSIA) approaches to national development, budget and macroeconomic planning and sectoral planning.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Poverty Data Collection

title: Support to Poverty Assessment & Reduction in Caribbean
